inscription:
two poems (waka)
right:death poem of Emperor Yozei
left:returning poem from Kmomachi

the returning poem supposed to be a bad poem being too similar to the Emperor\'s poem, that made this episode \"Komach as Parrot\" believed showing the poor creativity in her old age
medium: Woodblock print (beni-e); ink and limited color on paper, with hand-applied color
title: Six
